author: potuz
content: Can you describe what the advantage of b) is over the current mechanism?  Is is that reverting finality at each step is 1/3 slashable to the point of that finality? This looks to me as both quite doable and smart

author: fradamt
content: Yes, the advantage is that you still get economic finality immediately and building up over time, rather than it coming all at once after 2 epochs.
